Text:
Thank you Anonymous for the lots of books you are dealing with us.
Problems is we do need a list of them in every PART you give us, as you did in the beginning The we can choose to download. Your list og files only contents list of authors.
Now I pass.

first of all, thank you so much for posting these and for all your hard work, you rock!  however, would you be able to post all the files in the torrent rather than rar, so that way we could see the individual books?  i don't want to complain, just hoping you might be able to do this.  thanks again! :)
